note.p: Burial: Near the remains of Sir Christopher Wren, in the crypt of St Paul's Cathedral, London
References: A W Skempton, 'The Publication of Smeaton's Reports' in NR 1971 vol 26 pp 135-155
T E Allibone, 'The Club of the Royal College of Physicians, the Smeatonian Society of Civil Engineers and their Relationship to the Royal Society Club' in NR 1967 vol 22 pp 186-192
